name: Temple of the Elemental Lords
desc: All monsters you control gain 200 ATK/DEF for every different Attribute among the monsters in your GY. Once per turn: You can add 1 "Elementsaber" monster from your Deck to your hand, then skip the Battle Phase of your next turn (even if this card leaves the field). Once per turn, if an "Elementsaber" monster you control or in your hand would activate an effect by sending a card(s) from your hand to the GY, you can send an "Elementsaber" monster(s) from your Deck to the GY instead.
